 rupees. Deal?

I'm still in shock! Thanks a bunch!

column3:
買える物なら何でも買い取っちゃいますよー！
遠慮なく おっしゃってくださいね！
column4:
I'll buy anything that can be bought!
Don't hold back. Just sell, sell, sell!

column3: いっぱい買い取っちゃいますよ～
column4: I'll buy a lot from you—just wait and see!

column4:
If you don't need something, why not
use this opportunity to sell it?

column3:
他には何かありますか？
全部でも買い取っちゃいますよ！
column4:
Do you have anything else?
I'll buy everything you have, if you want!

column3:
ですか？
いくつ買い取りましょう？
column4: How many would you like to sell?

が個っと…

column3:
いらっしゃーい
呉服屋『忍杏亭』へようこそ
ウチにあるのはクラコレの特別な服ばかり！

特にそこにある忍びスーツは
今シーズンイチオシとなっております！
不用品の買い取りもいたしてますので
いつでもお声掛けくださーい
column4:
Welcome to Enchanted,
my high-end boutique!

We exclusively stock the special
garments of the Claree Collection!

In fact, that stealth chest guard over
there is highly recommended!

Oh, and we also buy anything you
don't need, so just talk to me when
you're ready!

column3:
いらっしゃーい
呉服屋『忍杏亭』へようこそ
裸でいきなり現れるから
てっきり変態かと思っちゃったけど…
ウチはクラコレの特別な服ばかり！

お兄さんみたいに服に無頓着な方でも
大満足な品ぞろえですよー！
特にそこにある忍びスーツは
今シーズン イチオシとなっております！
不用品の買い取りも いたしておりますので
いつでも お声掛けくださーい
column4:
Welcome to Enchanted,
my high-end boutique!

The fact that you showed up out of
nowhere—and stark naked, no less—
means you're likely a total creep.
But that's no business of mine! Anyhoo...
Here, we exclusively stock the special
garments of the Claree Collection!
I'm certain even someone like you,
who has given up on clothes altogether,
will find something you like here!
In fact, that stealth chest guard over
there is highly recommended!

Oh, and we also buy anything you
don't need, so just talk to me when
you're ready!

column3: 服はいかが？
column4: Need some new clothes?

column3: いい服あるよ
column4: Our clothes are the tops!

column3: こんばんはー
column4: Good evening!

column3: いつでもどうぞ～
column4: Come back anytime!

column3:
ココにあるのはクラコレの特別な服ばかり！
ゆっくり見てってくださいねー！
column4:
Everything here is part of the specially
curated Claree Collection. Please,
take your time looking around!

column3:
ちょっとちょっと！
気が付いたら すっからかんじゃないですか！
あ… でもこれって…
もう仕事しなくていい… ってこと？
ふふっ… しばらくラズリやおばあちゃんと
旅行でもいこうかな～！
column4:
Hold on a minute! It seems we've
sold out our entire stock!

So... I guess that means...
I don't have to work anymore!

Heh! Maybe I'll take a vacation!
Ooh, yeah! I'll bring Lasli or my
granny along too!

column3:
クラコレっていったら
クラリコレクションに決まってるじゃないですか
私のおススメなんで
ホントに おススメですよー！
それぞれの服には それぞれの機能があって
それぞれだから それぞれ見てってくださいね！
column4:
The Claree Collection! As in a high-end
collection curated by me, Claree.
BUT OF COURSE.
I've personally selected each and every
item in here using my flawless fashion
sense.
It's all HIGHLY recommended.
Each item has its own unique features
and abilities, so take a good look!

column3:
ありがとうございまーす！
すっごくお似合いになると思いますよー！！
column4:
Thanks! That'll look great on you!
Really!

column3:
まだ他にも何かご用ですか？
なんでも聞いてくださいねー！
column4:
Do you need something else?
Go on—ask me anything!

column3:
ありがとーございまーす！
いい買い物しちゃいましたね！
column4:
Thanks! You've made a great purchase!

column3:
お店休めたら どこ行こうかな…
せっかくだし 『ラブポンド』探してみようかな…
column4:
Once I get out of here, where should I go?
Hmm, maybe I'll try to find that pond...
The one that promises love...

column3:
ここにいると外の世界のモンが珍しくって！
色々見たいし いつでも売りに来てくださいねー
column4:
Being stuck in this tiny town, I get pretty
excited about stuff from the outside...

I'm always happy to take a look at what
you've collected, so come back if you
ever want to sell anything!

column3:
それ良くないですか？
忍杏亭限定の特別な装束なんですよー
それを着ると足音が出にくくなるから
狩りなんかで使うと重宝しますよー
…その分 ちょっと防御力は
弱くなりますけどね
column4:
Isn't that lovely? It's a limited-edition
Enchanted exclusive!

While you wear it, your footsteps are
nearly soundless, so it's perfect for
hunting and stuff.
Oh, but it offers very little defense. Small price
for the extra stealth...

Welcome to Enchanted,
my high-end boutique!

By the by, that stealth chest guard
over there is highly recommended.

While you wear it, your footsteps are
nearly soundless, so it's perfect for
hunting and stuff!
Oh, but it offers very little defense. Small price
for the extra stealth...
